subject: Police
Stun Guns
lead_paragraph: Buffalo Bills defensive back Donte Whitner was shocked with a stun gun and arrested by officers trying to control a rowdy crowd outside a Cleveland nightclub, the police said. Whitner, 23, was jailed early Saturday, Lt. Thomas Stacho said. He was released, and a prosecutor will decide whether to file charges.
